summary: This document appears to be a financial certification related to an institutional account at Deutsche Bank, involving Jeffrey Epstein and Southern Financial. It outlines the responsibilities and acknowledgments of the institutional account regarding investment strategies and risks. The document is marked confidential and pertains to compliance with federal securities laws.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the authorized signatory for the Southern Financial institutional account, indicating his involvement in financial transactions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Etteteln
persons.context: Jeffrey Etteteln is also listed as an authorized signatory, suggesting he has a role in the management or oversight of the account.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signatories for the same institutional account, indicating a professional relationship in managing the account.

keyFacts: The document is a financial certification related to an institutional account at Deutsche Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as an authorized signatory for the Southern Financial institutional account.
The document outlines the responsibilities of the institutional account regarding investment strategies and risks.
It is marked confidential and pertains to compliance with federal securities laws.
Jeffrey Etteteln is also mentioned as an authorized signatory for the account.
